user.name: Nischal Shrestha
user.bio:
ABOUT ME

Nischal Shrestha, 24
Kathmandu, Nepal

I am a problem solver who is interested in solving everything tech. My main background and projects are in Software Development, Data Science and Artificial Intelligence, which I had the pleasure of working on during my studies and at my work. I love to work in teams and make meaningful contributions with like-minded people.

When I’m not coding, you’ll find me reading novels, day dreaming or watching YouTube.

Feel free to drop me a message if you want to chat about tech, novels, or the best YouTube rabbit holes—I'm always up for a good conversation!

Coursework: DBMS, Algorithms, Software Engineering, Data Structures

work.title: Python Intern (Backend)
work.description:
–Assisted in creating automated data pipelines for web scraping and data ingestion.
– Worked with MySQL, MongoDB and Redis to store and query large datasets.
– Utilized Docker and Linux for environment setup and deployment of data-centric services.
– Documented APIs and pipeline logic for maintainability and team collaboration.

work.title: Technical Support Representative
work.description:
– Resolved technical issues related to networks, IP configuration, and DNS.
– Kept detailed support logs and worked directly with clients to solve connectivity problems.

work.title: Cloudworker (Data Annotation)
work.description:
–Labeled, cleaned, and verified datasets for machine learning and computer vision tasks.
– Ensured data accuracy and adherence to strict project guidelines.

projects.name: Django Blog
projects.description: A basic blog platform built with Django, HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.

projects.name: Web Scraper API
projects.description: A Python web scraper that fetches data and serves it via a Flask REST API (uses Scrapy under the hood).

projects.name: RealAgents: House Sales Prediction
projects.description: Part of a DataCamp practical exam: analyzed house sales data and built LR & RF models to predict listing prices, achieving RMSE < 30,000.

projects.name: StudentPortal
projects.description: An ASP.NET MVC CRUD app using Entity Framework Core and SQL Server, built with .NET 8 MVC template and Bootstrap UI.
